meanings.definition: Chosen for a position or office through a vote
meanings.sent1: The elected leader promised to listen to everyone's ideas.
meanings.sent2: The mayor is an elected official who represents the people.
meanings.sent3: The elected dog catcher was determined to catch every stray pup in town.
meanings.sent4: The elected captain of the team steered them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The elected student council president inspired her classmates with her speeches.

meanings.sent1: The elected committee members worked together to solve problems.
meanings.sent2: The elected representatives gathered to discuss important issues.
meanings.sent3: The elected chef prepared a feast fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: The elected team captain led by example on and off the field.
meanings.sent5: The elected spokesperson eloquently presented their case to the public.

meanings.definition: To choose or make a decision by voting
meanings.sent1: The town will elect a new mayor next month.
meanings.sent2: Citizens will elect their leaders in a fair and transparent process.
meanings.sent3: I will elect to have pizza for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent4: Let's elect to go on a hike this weekend.
meanings.sent5: She decided to elect to pursue a career in medicine.
